post_title: SGC Graded T206s: Rube Waddell Hindu, John McGraw Black Lenox & Mike Donlin Hindu)
post_content:
First attempt using my phone so here goes. This is posted on Facebook as well.

I will respond quicker to email (the.cards.of.our.pastime@gmail.com) but PM is fine too. I will always respond to any offers and am not offended by any offers. 

Zelle or Venmo preferred at this point, but PayPal, money order also are more than fine. PayPal FF isnt an option for me at the moment.

McGraw Lenox $4500 obo
Waddell Hindu $2700 obo
Fielder Jones Hindu $SOLD
Donlin Hindu [STRIKE]$750[/STRIKE] $675

My apologies if these pictures are out of order!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
